item.title: Vosk
item.description: ffmpeg.wasmをgithub pagesで動かすよを読んでいて、Offline Transcribeを見に行ったらccoreilly/vosk-browser: A speech recognition library running in the browser thanks to a WebAssembly build of Vosk経由してalphacep/vosk-api: Offline speech recognition API for Android, iOS, Raspberry Pi and servers with Python, Java, C# and Nodeというものの存在
